data.meta_description: Learn about Susan Blakely on AppleÂ TV. Browse shows and movies that include Susan Blakely, such as Over The Top, The Towering Inferno and more.
data.text:
Waiting for the Right Snapper

Charlie tries to resist temptation when he meets the grown daughter of the woman he's dating (Susan Blakely) and realizes they've met before. Jane Lynch guest stars as Dr. Freeman.

The Big Day

As the birth date of her triplets quickly approaches, a frazzled and emotional Rebecca forgets Jack's birthday. Dr K struggles with the loss of his wife and wonders how he'll be able to continue on with his life without her.

Faking It

Kitty tries to reinvents herself when she meets handsome handyman, Jack but she soon learns that honesty is the best policy. Meanwhile, the rest of the Walkers are in on a surprise birthday celebration for Sarah; what they all don't know is that Sarah has been lying to Luc about her age to appear younger.
